dwf.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.37
dwf.description:
async_xor: increase src_offs when dropping destination page

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.37 by commit cab2e8e5997b592fdb7d02cf2387b4b8e3057174, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 29bcff787a2593b2126cfaff612c0b4e560022e9. For more details please see the references link.
